mapper.insert: insert into STOCK_DATA (CODE, PRICE_DATE, PRICE_OPEN, PRICE_HIGH, PRICE_LOW, PRICE_CLOSE, PRICE_VOLUME) values (#{code}, #{date}, #{open}, #{high}, #{low}, #{close}, #{volume})
mapper.select: select pr.date, pr.open, pr.high, pr.low, pr.close, pr.volume from stock_price pr where pr.code = (select c.code from stock_code c where c.name = #{selected_name})
